paper_abstract: We propose a motor speed ripple elimination method using a state dependent disturbance observer (SDDOB). The SDDOB eliminates the state dependent disturbance in the system regardless of the operation frequency, input time delay and output time delay. The SDDOB and a main proportional integral (PI) controller constitute a robust motor speed controller. Experimental results show the effectiveness of the proposed method.
paper_title: Motor Speed Ripple Elimination Using State Dependent Disturbance Observer in Various Time Delay Environments
